Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Iron the shirt.']

behavior wash_shirt(shirt:item, washing_machine:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(shirt, washing_machine)
        # Place the shirt inside the washing machine

behavior start_washing_machine(washing_machine:item):
    body:
        achieve closed(washing_machine) # Close the washing machine door
        achieve is_on(washing_machine) # Start the washing machine

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and dirty(shirt)
        # Select a dirty shirt
        bind washing_machine: item where:
            is_washing_machine(washing_machine)
        # Select a washing machine
        
        wash_shirt(shirt, washing_machine)
        start_washing_machine(washing_machine)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Iron the shirt.']

def is_shirt_and_dirty(item:item):
    # Check if the item is a shirt and is dirty
    return is_clothes_shirt(item) and dirty(item)

behavior wash_shirt(in_dirty_shirt:item):
    body:
        assert is_shirt_and_dirty(in_dirty_shirt)
        wash(in_dirty_shirt)
        achieve clean(in_dirty_shirt)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind dirty_shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(dirty_shirt) and dirty(dirty_shirt)
        wash_shirt(dirty_shirt)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are:

behavior wash_shirt(shirt:item, washing_machine:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(shirt, washing_machine)
        # Put the shirt inside the washing machine
        achieve closed(washing_machine)
        # Close the washing machine door
        achieve is_on(washing_machine)
        # Turn on the washing machine to start washing the shirt

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and dirty(shirt)
        # Select the dirty shirt
        bind washing_machine: item where:
            is_washing_machine(washing_machine)
        # Select a washing machine
        wash_shirt(shirt, washing_machine)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Dry the shirt.', '3. Iron the shirt.']

def is_dirt_on_shirt(shirt:item):
    # Function to check if there is dirt on the shirt
    symbol dirt_on_shirt=dirty(shirt)
    return dirt_on_shirt

behavior wash_shirt(shirt:item, sink:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(shirt, sink)
        # Place the shirt inside the sink

        if is_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            # If the pool has a faucet, turn it on to wash

        wash(shirt) 
        # Wash the shirt

        if is_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
            # If the pool has a faucet, turn it off after washing

behavior check_cleaned_shirt(shirt:item):
    body:
        if is_dirt_on_shirt(shirt):
            # The shirt is still dirty after washing
            achieve clean(shirt) 
        # If the shirt still has dirt, clean it again until it is clean

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt)

        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        # Select a sink

        wash_shirt(shirt, sink)
        check_cleaned_shirt(shirt)
